mapper.select: SELECT UPPER(COLUMN_NAME) AS 'fieldName', case when DATA_TYPE = 'numeric' then 'numeric' + '(' + convert(varchar, NUMERIC_PRECISION) + ',' + convert(varchar, NUMERIC_SCALE) + ')' when DATA_TYPE = 'varchar' then 'varchar' + '(' + convert(varchar, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH) + ')' else DATA_TYPE end as 'fieldType', convert(VARCHAR(255), (SELECT p.value FROM sys.tables AS t INNER JOIN sys.columns AS c ON t.object_id = c.object_id LEFT JOIN sys.extended_properties AS p ON t.object_id = p.major_id AND c.column_id = p.minor_id WHERE t.name = cl.TABLE_NAME and c.name = cl.COLUMN_NAME)) AS 'remark' FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS cl WHERE TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}
